Seal characters (1)

疁字的基本解释

疁
liú
烧去草木之后下种：“吴北野禺栎东所舍大疁者。吴王田也。”
开沟引水灌溉：“开江西疁田千馀顷，以为军储。”
地名：疁城（中国上海市嘉定县的简称）。
姓。

疁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liú］
［《廣韻》力求切，平尤，來。］
(1)火耕。
(2)指火耕之田。
(3)开沟灌田。参见“疁田”。
(4)地名。疁城，上海市嘉定县的别称。
(5)姓。宋有疁子耕。见《正字通》。

疁字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【田字部】　疁； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页766第15
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?力求切，音留。【說文】燒穜也。漢律曰：疁田茠。艸，从田翏聲。【正字通】謂以火燒田而種也。　又姓。【正字通】疁子耕，宋人，號蕭閒居士，著蕭閒詞一卷。　又【集韻】許六切，音畜。又呼酷切，音熇。義?同。

疁字的起名意思

指烧去草木之后下种或开沟引水灌溉，也指地名，如疁城。

疁
Basic explanation of words
疁
liú
After burning the grass and trees, plant it: "Wu North Yeyu Quercus is home to the big boiled man. Wu Wangtian is also."
Ditching to divert water for irrigation: "We will open more than a thousand hectares of Jiangxi's barn fields for military reserves."
Place name: Dancheng (abbreviation for Jiading County, Shanghai, China).
name.
疁
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liú］
["Guangyun" strives to cut, Pingyou, come. ]
(1) Fire cultivation.
(2) Refers to the land of fire farming.
(3) Ditching and irrigating fields. See "疁田".
(4) Place name. Dancheng, another name for Jiading County in Shanghai.
(5) Last name. Song You Zi Geng. See "Zhengzitong".
疁
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Tian Zi Department] 　疁; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 766 No. 15
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Strive to cut and keep the sound. [Said the text] also burned. The Han law says: 疁田茠. He, from Tian Jue. 【Zhengzitong】It means that the fields are planted by fire.　Another last name. [Zhengzitong] Yan Zigeng, born in Song Dynasty, named Xiao Xian Jushi, with a volume of Xiao Xian's poems.　[Jiyun] Xu Liuqie, sound animal. Called cool and cut again, the sound is 熇. Righteous? Same.
疁

Old glyph
疁
Name meaning
Refers to planting or ditching to irrigate after the grass is burned. It also refers to the name of the place, such as the city.
liú
гл. выжигать (поле перед посевом); пережжённый; удобренный золой сожжённых деревьев (о поле)
疁田千余顷 выжечь более тысячи цинов земли под поля; более тысячи цинов пережжённого поля
